flawed_nl_solution:
The left-hand mice cost 120*0.3=$<<120*0.3=36.0>>36.0 more than right-handed ones
So they cost 120+36.0=$<<120+36.0=165.0>>165.0
So he makes 165.0*25=$<<165.0*25=4125.0>>4125.0 a day
The store is open 7-3=<<7-3=4>>4 days a week
So in a week, he makes 4125.0*4=$<<4125.0*4=16500.0>>16500.0

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 156.0, not 165.0. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
